org.protune.core
Interface Checker

All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyChecker
public interface Checker

The interface Checker provides methods for checking whether a notification is (not) reliable, i.e. whether an action, which is supposed to be executed, was actually executed as reported in its notification. Therefore a suitable method should be implemented for each kind of notification available in the Protune system (i.e. for each known subclass of Notification).
NOTE: The interface Checker should be aware of each subclass of Notification available in the system, therefore whenever a new subclass is added, the interface Checker (all classes implementing it) should be modified.

Author:
jldecoi
